thread.title: Landlady - The World Is A Loud Place
thread.title_full: Landlady - The World Is A Loud Place

title: Landlady - The World Is A Loud Place
text: Landlady 'The World Is A Loud Place' 2xLP Vinyl + Bonus Embroidered Patch Record/Vinyl Deluxe limited edition 2xLP vinyl release w/ packaging featuring art by Jesse Jacobs. Three LP sides of music plus an art etching on side D! Full color 18"x24" poster insert! See our early mockup in the product images. Your package also includes a Landlady sticker. These are shipping at the end of January 2017. Since we know you're waiting, we're gonna mail you a Landlady embroidered patch immediately. Includes digital pre-order of The World Is A Loud Place . You get 4 tracks now (streaming via the free Bandcamp app and also available as a high-quality download in MP3, FLAC and more), plus the complete album the moment it's released. shipping out on or around January 20, 2017 Pre-order Now
